channel.title: [CRASH] HEV suit
channel.description:
Hi, i've encountered an annoying issue in black mesa. On chapter anomalous materials, whenever i pick up the hev suit, the game crashes instantly. I'm on the public beta, paid steam version. My specs are spectacular, i haven't encountered any other problems while playing the game (i had to skip the map where you pick up the suit though).
The corresponding dump file: https://textuploader.com/1oa0w
Specs Details: Windows 10 64 bit Nvidia Geforce Gtx 1070 AMD ryzen 5 3600 16 gb 3000 mhz ram MSI B350 gaming plus SSD 1 tb

item.title: [CRASH] HEV suit
item.dc:creator: badareus
item.description:
I reduced my resolution and changed to window mode and it worked.
After the suit was on I changed my settings back.

Read full topic

item.title: [CRASH] HEV suit
item.dc:creator: Eselter
item.description:
Bug still exists in 1.0
While booting suit game display some random glyths on center and propably some of them causa game crash. We need try few times loading game to pass this boot screen.

Read full topic
